ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.description:
Mailpit is an email testing tool for developers. It acts as an SMTP server,
captures all sent emails, and displays them in a modern web interface.
It also provides a REST API for integration testing.

Key features:
- Fast, lightweight, and low memory usage
- Multi-platform support (Linux, macOS, Windows)
- Modern web UI for viewing emails
- REST API for automated testing
- Support for SMTP relay
- Message tagging and search
- Real-time web UI updates
about.summary: A small, fast, low memory, zero-dependency, multi-platform email testing tool & API for developers

name: mailpit

about.description:
Mailpit is an email testing tool for developers. It acts as an SMTP server,
captures all sent emails, and displays them in a modern web interface.
It also provides a REST API for integration testing.

Key features:
- Fast, lightweight, and low memory usage
- Multi-platform support (Linux, macOS, Windows)
- Modern web UI for viewing emails
- REST API for automated testing
- Support for SMTP relay
- Message tagging and search
- Real-time web UI updates
about.summary: A small, fast, low memory, zero-dependency, multi-platform email testing tool & API for developers

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.28.3" %}

package:
  name: mailpit
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/axllent/mailpit/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a434a76acdf4aaaba8856396a1405867ff92a796e5cef4e8d62bad6ba8bc8374

build:
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('go-cgo') }}
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib('c') }}
    - go-licenses
    - nodejs >=18

test:
  commands:
    - mailpit --help

about:
  home: https://github.com/axllent/mailpit
  summary: A small, fast, low memory, zero-dependency, multi-platform email testing tool & API for developers
  description: |
    Mailpit is an email testing tool for developers. It acts as an SMTP server,
    captures all sent emails, and displays them in a modern web interface.
    It also provides a REST API for integration testing.

    Key features:
    - Fast, lightweight, and low memory usage
    - Multi-platform support (Linux, macOS, Windows)
    - Modern web UI for viewing emails
    - REST API for automated testing
    - Support for SMTP relay
    - Message tagging and search
    - Real-time web UI updates
  license: MIT
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - library_licenses/
  doc_url: https://mailpit.axllent.org/docs/
  dev_url: https://github.com/axllent/mailpit

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rxm7706

about.description:

It also provides a REST API for integration testing.

Key features:
